data.name: Mega Knockdown - Green Screen Jeremy
data.detailed_description:
This free DLC unlocks the Green Screen Jeremy alternate costume for every character.

This DLC is also included in the game's free demo, so it can be played without purchasing anything.

To use this DLC, press F1 or F2 in the character select screen to enable Jeremy Mode for Player 1 or Player 2, respectively.

Special thanks to Jerma985 for recording this footage.

Disclaimer: This DLC is unaffiliated with Jerma985, was not commissioned by him, and does not represent his views. This content was made as a hobbyist project by a solo developer. It is a free addition to Mega Knockdown, and will remain free.

data.short_description: This free DLC will add 'Green Screen Jeremy' as a selectable art style for every character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6300HQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 530
